statements: SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM Feedback;
SELECT * FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE passenger_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE passenger_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id > 1000 AND passenger_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE passenger_id <> 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE passenger_id IN (4,5) ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM passengers_feedback;
SELECT id, feedback FROM passengers_feedback WHERE passenger_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE date_submitted >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_id, complaint FROM complaints ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT id, feedback, date_submitted FROM passengers_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT id, passenger_id, feedback, date_submitted FROM passengers_feedback WHERE passenger_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM passengers_feedback WHERE DATE(date_submitted) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM passengers_feedback GROUP BY passenger_id;
SELECT feedback, date_submitted FROM passengers_feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT id, complaint, date_submitted FROM complaints WHERE passenger_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT id, complaint_text FROM Complaint WHERE passenger_id = 1001;
SELECT issue_type, issue_description FROM TransportationIssues WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT id, issue_type, issue_description FROM TransportationIssues ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Complaint WHERE LENGTH(complaint_text) > 100
SELECT issue_type, issue_description FROM TransportationIssues WHERE resolved = FALSE
SELECT id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaint ORDER BY complaint_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE passenger_id = 123;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role FROM staff WHERE department_id = 456 ORDER BY staff_name;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM department WHERE department_location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT staff_name, staff_role, department_name FROM staff INNER JOIN department ON staff.department_id = department.department_id WHERE staff_role = 'Manager';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, staff_name, department_name FROM feedback JOIN staff ON feedback.passenger_id = staff.staff_id JOIN department ON staff.department_id = department.department_id;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(staff_id) AS total_staff FROM department LEFT JOIN staff ON department.department_id = staff.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passenger_table WHERE passenger_id = 123;
SELECT route_name, transport_type FROM route_table WHERE route_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT complaint_text FROM complaint_table WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_text, resolved_date FROM resolution_table ORDER BY resolution_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passenger_table WHERE passenger_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM route_table WHERE transport_type = 'bus';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passenger_table INNER JOIN feedback_table ON passenger_table.passenger_id = feedback_table.passenger_id;
SELECT complaint_text, resolution_text FROM complaint_table LEFT JOIN resolution_table ON complaint_table.complaint_id = resolution_table.complaint_id;
